channel.title: Hmmm...can't find the problem
channel.description:
I've been trying to add a shop, and just can't do it when i add the npc, i add the shop in my client.java, as the tuts say, and i just disconnect
autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 556 3540 9891 0 3541 9892 3539 9890 1 NewNPC[/code]
client.java [code]} else if (NPCID == 556) { //TuT shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 10; //TuT Shop[/code]
